summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3709 for the improvement of Youngstown Place, from West Spokane Street to 24th Avenue Southwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45596, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
